Text: RE Confidentiality Agreement Cc agreement to Mr Fredericks There is no problem between counsel Im alerting Mr OConnor not to expect the ca Original Message From Tana Jones mailto Sent Tuesday July PM To Subject Confidentiality Agreement Mark I am sorry but there seems to be a little confusion in our shop about who your attorney should be on this deal I was given Andrew OConnors name and left him a message to which he finally responded He is now expecting to see this CA I have now been given Wesley Fredericks name as your attorney I dont want to cause any conflict between attorneys and wanted to get your direction as to how I should handle this I am Tana Jones and I am a paralegal in the Legal Department and my phone number is

RE Confidentiality Agreement Cc The CA is fine Do you want me to sign the nonletterhead version and forward to you or would you prefer to telefax a signed letterhead version have me sign it and fax it back Please let me know Thank you Marc Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday July PM To Marc Mellman Cc Subject RE Confidentiality Agreement Importance High Hi Marc Tana Jones from our legal department just called me and said that before I sent Wesley Fredricks information over to her Andrew O Connor returned her phone call and is now expecting the document from us You may receive an email from her to try to sort this out Thanks a lot Savita Marc Mellman on PM To cc Subject RE Confidentiality Agreement To follow up the complete info for Mr Fredericks is as follows Wesley C Fredericks Jr Dorsey Whitney LLP Park Avenue New York NY fax Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday July PM To Marc Mellman Subject Re Confidentiality Agreement Importance High I maybe mistaken but I think Jack had given me the name of Andrew O Connor tel as your attorney I hust want to make sure that Wesley Fredricks is the person we need to sen it to Please let me know Savita Marc Mellman on PM To cc Jack D Cogen Subject Confidentiality Agreement Our attorney is Wesley Fredericks Esq His email address is You may forward the document to Mr Fredericks by email Marc Mellman
